patient_info: Abnormality of the ureter,Proteinuria,Abnormality of the auditory canal,Hypercholesterolemia,Fractured hand bones,Abnormal finger phalanx morphology,Unilateral deafness,Abnormality of the tympanic membrane,Nasal polyposis
golden_diagnosis: 法布雷病/Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease,法布雷病/Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease,法布雷病/Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease
predict_diagnosis:
1. Alport syndrome
2. Loeys-Dietz syndrome
3. Ehlers-Danlos syndrome, vascular type
4. Autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease (ADPKD)
5. Osteogenesis imperfecta
6. Usher syndrome
7. Tuberous sclerosis complex (TSC)
8. Hyperlipoproteinemia type IIa
9. Mitochondrial disease, specifically mitochondrial DNA depletion syndrome
10. Branchio-oto-renal (BOR) syndrome

Please note that this list is not exhaustive, and further clinical evaluation, family history, and genetic testing may be necessary for a definitive diagnosis.
